name: GTG Audio Player
author: czerstwyjurek

sections.description:
GTG Audio Player is a simple plugin for playing audio files on wordpress websites.
It lets you create playlists and embed them on your website via short codes.
All you have to do is create your album. Then simply add songs to your album through integrated media library or link to other web directory (remmember you need URL address). All whats left is to use shortcode that was generated for your album in your posts or pages.
Plugin allows multiple different albums on one page.
Tutorial:
https://youtu.be/RIAsT6UH7iI
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gtg_audio_player directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
My audio file won’t play.
Check if you have entered correct URL to your files.

Autoplay won’t work on mobiles.
Nothing can be done about this. Autoplay is blocked on mobiles because of mobile bandwidth usage.
